titles.title: I Give My Life To You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I don't want to live for my own selfish gain
In endless cycles of my sin
I know you called me to your purposes
I wouldn't trade it for the world
Chorus:
I give my life to You
I'm ready to give You, the life that I've known
I give my heart to You
Take all of me, I believe in You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I know with You I can do anything
Your grace has freed me from my fear
I know that I could be an instrument
I wouldn't trade it for the world
